page.title: 16MEDIA
page.content: The main local newspaper serving the area is the{SOMERSET COUNTY GAZETTE which is pulished every Friday and is the main vehicle of news for the area. Taunton does not yet have a local radio station though Radio Bristol do have an office in Taunton.The Gazette publishes small items headed{Area {News}the following being the entry for Trull on July 12,1985{TRULL}.SPONSORED FOOTBALL-Tomorrow will see the start of a 24-hour, Five-a-side football match to raise funds for the new Comeytrowe Community centre.12 young people will play from 8 pm until 8pm on Sunday sponsored per goal per hour.Donations can also be given.There will also be a competition for anyone to enter for only 10p-guess the number of goals scored in 24 hours.The entrant guessing the closest will win Â£10.
